videos.headline: Virginia's Taylor goes the distance for 85-yard pick-6
videos.description: Noah Taylor intercepts Malik Cunningham's pass and darts the other way for an 85-yard score.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Virginia's Taylor goes the distance for 85-yard pick-6) 2020/11/14 ESHEET
